QuestData.Title: Hunting the Stalker
QuestData.Description:
Now that you have your trap, there's a problem we need to deal with.
A wild beast has been stalking our camp. It's already stolen some of our food. We have little enough as it is.
You and I will work together. Set your freezing trap and lure out whatever this creature is.
Once it is caught, I will determine if the beast can be tamed... or if it needs to be put down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use your Freezing Trap within the Ogre Ruins to lure out the beast stalking the camp.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thank you for the help, $n. I have one last lesson to impart--calling a different companion to your side.
There are plenty of wild beasts on this island. See which ones you can tame.

Objectives.Objective: Freezing trap used within Ogre Ruins to capture stalker
